author: cms-nanoAOD
body:
- Use updated jecs for lepton-jets variables
- update tau mva ids
- minor fix in ttH lepton MVA 

same as #22840 

@fabiocos  This PR on the AN branch is mostly to test it without pulling in the whole #22828

We could close this and go directly to CMSSW_9_4_X once #22828 is merged but only if @slava77  @perrotta  are ok with it (there is a reco signature needed), otherwise we go via AN release (perhaps made as a patch on to of 945 given that differences are minimal)
title: Update NanoAOD for MiniAOD v2 - part 3 (94X main branch version)
